#irl #event #art #design #print #for-others #2020

My Famicase Exhibition 2020

My Famicase Exhibition is an annual exhibition hosted by METEOR. Around 250 participants create Famicom game cartridge labels, which are then printed and displayed in a gallery in Tokyo, and printed in a catalog book.

Entry description: mingOS is a cartridge based operating system for Ming robots. Advanced AI gives Ming robots a high degree of intelligence unmatched by any competitor. mingOS 9.1 is compatible with Pico robots, mark 3 or later. Copyright Ming Systems Inc., 2099. View entry

fonts

  • tm-pico-B (unreleased)

tools
